item.title: Tags in jekyll(github)
item.description: This artical helps you how to build Tag page in your own “Jekyll” blog. First, creat a html file in your root directory, put the code in it: --- layout: default title: Tags in jekyll(github) permalink: /tag/ --- {## capture tags##} {## for tag in site.tags##} {{ tag[0] }} {## endfor ##} {## endcapture ##} {## assign sortedtags= tags | split:' ' | sort ##} {## for tag in sortedtags##} <h3 id="{{ tag }}">{{ tag }}</h3> <ul> {## for post date: 2014-12-27 title: Tags in jekyll(github) <li><a href="{{ post date: 2014-12-27 title: Tags in jekyll(github) {## endfor ##} </ul> {## endfor ##} Then, in your post date: 2014-12-27 title: Tags in jekyll(github)
